user.title: Configure Notification Action
user.description:
Create a new custom notification action that fires events instead of sending actual notifications. Perfect for advanced automations!

**Available template variables:**
• message - Notification message
• title - Notification title
• target - Notification target
• data - Data object (merged with default_data)
• action_id - The action ID
• friendly_name - The friendly name

data_description.action_id: Unique identifier for this action (e.g., 'my_notification'). Will be used as notify.my_notification
data_description.friendly_name: Display name shown in the Home Assistant UI
data_description.action_sequence: Optional sequence of actions to execute after firing the event. Use the visual editor to add service calls, delays, conditions, etc.
data_description.default_data: Default data object that will be available in templates and merged with notification data. User-provided data values will override these defaults. Leave empty for an empty object.

error.already_configured: An action with this ID already exists

abort.already_configured: This action has already been configured
